entry.title: [EU][Web Cloud] - Outlook Web Access mailbox migration
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 8, 16:10 UTC  -  Aug 30, 16:15 UTC

Mar 28, 04:46 UTC
Update - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Mar 28, 00:43 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Web Cloud offer.

Start time : 08/04/2024 16:10 UTC
End time : 30/08/2024 16:15 UTC
Service impact : Service interruption is expected for a few minutes to a few hours
Service improvement : The purpose of this operation is to migrate MXPLAN mailboxes under Outlook Web Access (OWA) to the new Zimbra Webmail.
No action is required from the customers.
For further information, please find attached a link to the FAQ: https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/fr-mx-plan-zimbra-faq?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0061410

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [GRA][Web Cloud] - Cloud Databases incident Notification
entry.content:
Apr 3, 01:52 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 03/04/2024 00:06 UTC
End time : 03/04/2024 01:00 UTC
Root cause : https://public-cloud.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/897ngd9y00sq
Database services hosted in GRA may have experienced primary re election causing disconnection from databases.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

entry.title: [GRA][DNS Hosting] - DNS incident notification
entry.content:

Apr 3, 01:34 UTC

Apr 3, 01:26 UTC

Apr 3, 01:02 UTC
